comments:
Sanchia met us and gave us a tour of the apartment, gym and pool. Great location, short walk to the metro and there are shops and a good pub close by. We had a great stay. The apartment is big and comfortable to be in. Really enjoyed being in Sydney We really enjoyed staying in Sanchia’s home. Very chill atmosphere, comfortable and well decorated. Yoga mat for morning exercise. The apartment is a very short walk to the trains on the airport line, and a quick trip to Central station or Circular Quay. We found nice restaurants in the area that could cater to gluten free dairy free diets. We would definitely stay again Sanchia's place is a fantastic base for exploring Sydney - very well connected to the city. The apartment is spacious and well equipped, we enjoyed having breakfast on the balcony after a dip in the pool.
Sanchia took the time to show us around the apartment complex which was very kind / helpful.
We would choose Sanchia's place again when we return to Sydney! What a lovely stay! Great area, lovely host. Would stay again The airbnb is a neat and very comfortable place to stay in. The area is a very quiet place and close to basically everything; restaurants, activities, stores, station etc. The only downside to this airbnb was no air-conditioning, I would find myself just sitting under the fan to cool off. We had a wonderful stay of 10 nights at Sanchia's apartment in Sydney.
The apartment was exactly as described and had absolutely everything we needed. It was very clean and ready to use, and also situated no more than 5 minutes from Green Square Station.
Furthermore, Sanchia was an excellent host.... always friendly, ready to help and responding very quickly.
Thank you, Sanchia. This was great!
Highly recommended. Me and my Girlfriend stayed for a week in Sydney at Sanchias place. We have never been to Australia before and it was the perfect start for us. We felt right at home!
The apartment had everything we needed and more. We needed somewhere with a well equipped kitchen and it had it all. The ceiling fans make a massive difference each with different settings and multiple lighting options available too. The sofa was so comfy and we both slept well every night as the bed was too!
Really good location with Green Square station about a 5 minute walk away and Waterloo station just a little more. Meaning you can get into the CBD quickly. There are supermarkets and places all within close proximity.
I would highly recommend staying here. One of the best Air BnB’s we have stayed in and hopefully we will return one Day!
Special thanks to Sanchia for being a friendly and responsive host :) Vi har haft 2 fantastiske uger i lejligheden. Den var ren og pæn og Sanchia er nem at komme i kontakt med og respondere hurtigt. Det ligger dejlig tæt stationen og derfra kan man se amt hvad byen har at byde på. Det er en kæmpe anbefaling at placere sig her i forhold til sightseeing af Sydney by. Gastgeberin war äußerst hilfsbereit. Wohnung ist verkehrstechnisch sehr gut angebunden: Zug, Bus und Metro - alle Haltestellen sind fußläufig zu erreichen. Ruhige Lage, da in Nebenstraße gelegen. Mitbenutzung von Swimminpool und Fitnessraum mit Geräten möglich. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (Woolie) und Restaurants am Green Square und in der Nähe der Wohnung. Great location and comfortable apartment. 100% recommended We loved staying at Sanchia's stylish place, it was welcoming, warm, clean and a great location. We stayed for 1 week and it was very comfortable, with amenities in the pantry, we felt like home. Sanchia was responsive from the beginning, easy to communicate with and checked in as well during our stay. The location is great with access to Green Square train station, to both the airport and cbd only minutes away. Great cafes, restaurants, parks and a lovely library too are very close. Thanks for everything Sanchia! Highly recommended :) Sanchia’s place was very clean, perfect for a cozy winter stay as there are heaters inside the room. The location was ideal and close to both the train & bus stops. Lovely flat in Alexandria, close to the Woolworth’s , IGA and other restaurants. The flat was very clean and had everything we need. Sanchia is also very responsive and a kind host. An excellent stay for us. This was not only a nice place, but also filled with care, good taste, and warmth.

A great place to stay while discovering northern coast of Sydney. Friendly, kind and just feel like home. Great place, feels like being at home. Marianne and Martin are very friendly and well-organized hosts. They are easy to talk to and care about their guests. They provide many useful recommendations and support if something should be unclear. The house was very clean and organized. I would certainly stay with them again. Thank you! I love this beautiful place💕
Marianne and Martin are so kind and humorous. Marianne told me about good spots in Sydney city and good places to get fish and chips which is my favourite. Martin told me nice beaches in Northern Sydney. He’s so humorous. I loved to have a conversation with them😁.
The room is big and cozy. I even didn’t want to go out as soon as I got into the room. I wanted to stay in the room for a whole day.
There are also two friendly doggies🤍🖤🐾. I already miss them.
I’ll stay at this place again if I visit Sydney again.
It was such a happy time in Marianne’s house. Ho trascorso qualche notte in una stanza in questa casa. I proprietari sono due persone amichevoli, disponibili e molto proattivi nel consigliarti/aiutarti. La camera è gli spazi comuni sono molto puliti e ordinati e la casa è fornita di tutto il necessario e anche di più. Può ospitare fino a 6 persone quindi è anche un ottimo posto dove socializzare e fare nuove amicizie. È ben collegata tramite il bus. Lo consiglio assolutamente i stayed with Marianne for 6 nights and everything was fantastic. She even cooked me a meal :) Had a wonderful time staying at Marianne’s place. Large room, fantastic location and Marianne goes over and above to make sure you are comfortable during your stay. Highly recommend! We had a fantastic 10
Days staying with Marianne and Martin they were both very welcoming and we enjoyed Marianne cooking as well on a couple evenings. Thank you both for letting us stay in your home Marianne's place was very clean and nice. She was very friendly and looked after us well. Marianne and Martin are lovely hosts. Generous with their house and respectful of privacy. They felt like old friends. Thank you for a warm and comfortable stay! Very friendly host. Very helpfull and answers on our questions about public transport, sightseeing Sydney, etc. After our late arrival she also shared her dinner with us. You are in a house with several other guests, but the house and bathroom is big enough. Great people. Easy going. Really private and east to access.
No fuss, chill space fir a Sydney Northside stay. Highly recommend. Marianne and Martin were super friendly to me. Everything is clean and the dogs were cute too. 房子很有设计感，家具也搭配得不错。主人热情好客。房间干净。靠近马路边，稍微有点噪音，后来习惯也就没感觉了。

Thank you Sue and Donald
We loved staying at your cosy guest suite and felt very welcomed and looked after but at same time had our own space.
Great private location and yet close to the shops, restaurants and facilities.
We highly recommend this lovely cosy special guest suite accommodation in a beautiful leafy green suburb close to the City and the Harbour
We will return warmest Debbi n Marty This is my second stay at Sue’s place. Such a lovely private space, clean and quiet with everything you need for a few days. Highly recommend. Sue and Donald were wonderful hosts and the accomodation was beautiful ❤️ Lovely air bnb with everything you need for a comfortable stay. I appreciated the pool swims and breakfast supplies. Nice and quiet area and a good location for me as I was spending time with relatives who live near by. Beautiful little apartment for 2 people. Sue provided many little touches such as breakfast ingredients, fruit, and bathroom toiletries. There is a swimming pool and beach towels are also provided. It’s 2 kms to the ferry at Huntleys Point for a scenic ride to the city.
Would definitely stay there again. Ben Sue and her husband are wonderful hosts! I booked this Guest Suite for my family members, and it was perfect for their stay! The Guest Suite is a very comfortable, private and peaceful space in a serene location. It's a great spot in Hunter Hill and only a short walk to the village with cafes and shops.
Sue was a pleasure to communicate with! She is super nice, responsive and accommodating.
We will book again! Sue was an incredible host. I booked the air bnb for my mum who was visiting from overseas and she felt right at home. Thank you Great place to stay and great hosts Sue was extremely helpful and flexible. I didn't get to meet her but her husband was very welcoming.
The space was well presented, quiet and welcoming. exactly what I needed for this trip. Fantastic spot in Hunters Hill. It is very clean, private and has a very comfy bed. Highly recommend! Can recommend this cosy home away from, perfect for two people! Some nice little extras in the fridge! Thanks Sue Sue & Donald,s place was everything that we required,good access to ferries which we used every day,private and peaceful,clean tidy and friendly.On the whole,a lovely getaway .Peter & Soo. Lovely base for a weekend in Sydney. The rain stopped us from walking around the local area but public transport options were nearby. Cosy and private space. Sue and Donald are wonderful hosts , friendly and very helpful .
There are no cooking facilities except a microwave but breakfasts are included and guests can choose to pay for a superb 2 course dinner cooked by Chef Sue!
The studio apartment is small but cosy situated in a beautiful setting. Highly recommend! Great spot to stay with a comfy bed and peaceful surrounds

Tranquility and serenity after a hard day. Priceless Nearby ferry and park, beds are comfortable, big living room. Loved staying at Stephanie and David's flat. Beautiful views and very peaceful. Hosts were easy to communicate with and left easy to follow instructions. Flat was very clean and beautifully decorated. Within walking distance to ferry terminal. Shops nearby. Would definitely stay again. Was schoon en netjes. Alles was er wat je nodig hebt. Amazing, quiet location with a very picturesque view. Great ammenities and plenty of activities and shops in a walkable distance Cosy, quiet stay with very friendly and helpful hosts. Lovely waterfront view. Thanks for a wonderful stay in your beautiful home This is a nice private location with a large deck overlooking the river and is walking distance to Kissing Point where we caught the ferry into the city. Stephanie is lovely, easy to communicate with, and made great recommendations. My friend and I loved our time in Sydney and this AirBnb was the cherry on top. Was such a lovely stay at Stephanie and David’s. It felt so homey, and was very peaceful with lovely water views. It was very clean and tidy and had everything we needed, would definitely book again. Really close to Ferries, loved the ease of transport to Sydney Harbour and Manly. Peaceful on the shoreline and being able to watch the water activities without it being noisy. Lots of space to spread out in the accommodation with a lovely partially covered deck. Such a luxury! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, the apartment had everything we needed for a very comfortable stay. Could not have asked for a better location. Easy walk to the Ferry & great local shops. Would certainly stay again. We had such a lovely and peaceful stay. The location was beautiful and we enjoyed the convenience of catching the ferry each day. Everything was spotless and well set out. We enjoyed the water views, morning paddles, and watching the sunrise.
I would highly recommend this stay and will be back! So quiet and peaceful.
You couldnt get any closer to the water front than here.
Easy walking distance to the ferry which was fantastic.
Would definitley stay here again and look forward to sitting out on the deck in some warmer weather. Very nice place peaceful and awesome location to everything great morning walks around the waters edge would definitely recommend will be back again Awesome Location. The Ferry Trip to circular Quay is an absolute must. The accommodation is amazing. Everything you need for a great stay. Lovely artwork on the walls. A true place that you would be delighted to call home. We loved our time. Stehanie's place is a true gem. Stephanie was the perfect host.

Elizabeth ist wirklich nett und o.k.
Der Aufenthalt war prima und die Lage ist gut. Aber morgens 5-6 Uhr immer Lärm von der Müllabfuhr und den Lieferanten der Restaurants.
Ich habe die Wohnung lieben gelernt nach einigen Tagen. Man kann ja auch die Fenster morgens schließen.
Der Preis war an der Grenze.
Dennoch, es hat mir gefallen. The apartment is safe and secure. It offers a suitable kitchen, good-sized bathroom, and pool. We appreciated the great washer and dryer, beautiful balcony with lush plants, parking spot, large smart TV, comfortable reclining sofa, and all just step away from Manly Beach. Elizabeth provides an orientation tour so you know where everything is located in the building and apartment. Great location and good sized unit just off the main corso and a 1 minute walk to the beach. Well appointed apartment with all the features you need. A fantastic stay. The unit was the best furnished that we’ve even seen. Lots of linen, blanket and towel options. The kitchen amenities had everything any cook could hope for. The location of the complex can’t be beat. Hospitality and communication was exceptional. The location is great close to both beaches. A good selection of shops and restaurants are nearby. The ferries to Sydney are 3 minutes walk away and the bus station about the same. The area is a mixture of residential and commercial so at certain times of the day it can get noisy. The apartment has a car parking space which is very useful since parking is very restricted round about. I was very familiar with the location and apartment complex so it was an easy choice. The location is in the heart of everything you will want or need. Restaurants, beach, ferry to Sydney were all steps away.
The host Elizabeth was very welcoming and a pleasure to work with. She was very accommodating and very accessible. Elizabeth responded quickly to any questions or requests.
The apartment was well equipped with everything you will need. My wife loves to cook and found the kitchen supplied with all the pots, pans and utensils she needed. One of the best features is easy access to the pool and spa. If you have young visitors like I did they will love it. The only negative, and I hate to even mention it since there are so many pluses, is the street noise in the morning. It can be a bit irritating. Unfortunately this is something the host has no control over.

Great location, very tranquil and relaxing place to stay!
Lots of very interesting books to read on the bookshelves We stayed with Victor and Toni for three months and from our very warm welcome to our very emotional departure we had a wonderful stay. We certainly intend to return when we can.
Victor and Toni are incredibly supportive hosts who respond rapidly to any queries whilst also respecting your privacy. They are delightful people and we thoroughly enjoyed their company.
Beacon Hills is a residential area but is within easy reach of the Northern beaches. It would benefit you to have a car but the local bus service is excellent and can get you anywhere you want to go. The accommodation is very clean and comfortable and the large terrace/garden area was a bonus. As were the wonderful views. On returning from trips out it felt like ‘coming home’.
I most certainly wouldn’t hesitate in recommending Victor and Toni’s Airbnb to anyone. We had a nice stay in this apartment. Toni and Victor are great hosts. The apartment if furnished with everything you need for a long stay, our son enjoyed playing in their backyards and Tony and Victor went out of their way to make us feel welcome and provide any help we needed. A good place to stay for a longer time with children! Charming, down to earth hosts live over comfortable downstairs unit with terraced backyard overgrown goodness overlooking the sea from Beacon Hill.
The trampoline is super fun to bounce around on and is also a good place to read a book.
We enjoyed the various and hilarious bird calls and the sound of the rain in the trees and on the patio.
Good water pressure, hot showers. Very hot in fact. All the amenities accounted for and if there were something you needed, such as an ironing board, etc. I'm sure it would be available - and an opportunity to say hello to Toni & Victor who are very nice people.
Recommended. We would certainly book here again. Calm and quiet place with pleasant garden and ocean views. Good for kids, the garden has a trampoline, swings and a basket ball net. Well-equipped kitchen, lots of space, clean and sunny. Friendly and helpful hosts. Wonderful hosts and a wonderful stay! Lots of space, a beautiful outlook and view, very homely, clean and comfortable. We look forward to staying there again! We stayed at Toni and Victor's apartment for three months. We had everything we needed to be very comfortable and had a wonderful experience.
The apartment is clean, gets a lot of sunlight due to its large windows, and has an airy feel. The kitchen has all the essentials for storing and cooking food, even for a longer stay. The beds are comfortable. I slept well at night and was happy to wake up to birds singing in the morning. You can see a lot of beautiful greenery from the windows and even the ocean from the kitchen.
The area just outside the apartment has outdoor furniture for eating and relaxing. The back yard is very secluded and has a hot tub, and the front yard with the hammock and a seating area is open to guests as well. Additionally, Toni and Victor always welcome their guests to enjoy the upstairs patio.
The area is safe and quiet and the house is within a walking distance from several bus stops, the closest of which is only a three minute walk away. We took public transit to Dee Why, Manly, various beaches, and Sydney all the time. Grocery stores can also be quickly reached by bus (10-15 minutes for the closest of them), and of course even quicker by car.
Toni and Victor are very kind and welcoming. They always made sure we had everything we needed, were very helpful, and responded to messages quickly. Thanks to them, we visitied a lot of local attractions that otherwise we wouldn't have known about and got the real Australia experience, rather than purely a tourist one.
We would definitely recommend Toni and Victor's place to anyone and would stay there again in a heartbeat. Great value and easy location to access northern beaches area. Very comfortable and clean. Excellent hosts Victor and Toni were great hosts, and the apartment gave a great base for exploring the North Beaches. The outside space was also a real treat, to soak in the views and the sunshine! Super comfy bed, and very clean! Great chill out area - hard to fault! Also great to be able to catch up on washing throughout our trip!! Toni and Victor are very kind.
They smile a lot and give us very detailed instruction.
the house is very clean and very cosy.
this house is a good choice for you to live First time with my family in Sydney, and it was an amazing stay at Toni & Victor’s place. Having two small kids, it can be a daunting task arranging a good holiday....we consider ourselves very fortunate that we landed in Beacon Hills at this very property. The place: good view of the sea, equipped with a trampoline for the kids, lovely garden, cosy apartment. The hosts: hospitable from day one, and made it personal with their many offers for help with our visit. The location: 10 min drive to Manly beach, 5 min drive to shops and eateries at Dee Why.
Would definitely recommended to anyone wanting a memorable Sydney northern suburb stay.
Shiva This property is family friendly. We chose this place as we were renovating our apartment in Fairlight and needed somewhere to live for two months. From day one it felt like home. Toni and Victor are lovely, kind and very generous hosts who went out of their way to help us in every situation. Our kids loved the large outdoor space, the trampoline and the spa tub! The views across to Manly and up to Narrabeen were incredible. We very much enjoyed our stay and wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to anyone. We loved staying at Toni and Victor's unit. It was clean, homely and comfortable. The hosts were friendly and hospitable. Living in the house above the flat they were available to answer queries and attend to minor problems promptly. The flat was spacious for 2 or 3 people. Excellent outdoor porch. Air con effective in humid weather. Short walk to bus stop on route to Warringah Mall and Manly. Would definitely recommend and happy to stay again.

We had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb! The check-in process was seamless, thanks to the clear and detailed instructions provided. The personal touches, such as a bottle of Prosecco and our favorite chocolates, made us feel so welcome.
The location is unbeatable—just a short walk to Bondi Beach, shops, and some lovely local restaurants, perfect for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
Our host, Ritchi, was incredibly responsive and friendly, always quick to answer any questions via text.
We highly recommend this accommodation to anyone planning a trip to Sydney, especially Bondi. 😊 We had an amazing family holiday at Ritchi’s beautiful Bondi apartment! From the moment we arrived, everything was perfect. The welcome gifts and complimentary beach towels were a very thoughtful touch and made us feel extremely welcome.
The apartment itself is stunning - newly renovated, bright, and beautifully decorated. It’s in a fantastic location, just a short walk to the beach, shops, cafes, and everything Bondi has to offer. The beds were comfortable, and the amenities (modern kitchen and bathroom) made our stay so convenient and enjoyable.
Ritchi was an exceptional host - super responsive and helpful, answering all our questions promptly.
We highly recommend staying here for anyone visiting Sydney. We’ll definitely be back next time we’re in Bondi. Thanks, Ritchi, for making our holiday so special! As an Airbnb host myself, I truly appreciate attention to quality and detail, and this stay exceeded all expectations. Communication was flawless before, during, and after the stay, and the host was always available for any questions. The apartment was ready with a perfect welcome package that set a lovely tone for the stay. The information provided was clear and helpful, including great recommendations for dining – we especially loved Society and Lox Stock & Barrel.
The apartment was spotless, stylish, and very chic, with a thoughtfully interior that made it a comfortable place to stay. Although we were initially unsure about staying in a place without air conditioning, the breeze from Bondi Beach and the fans worked perfectly.
Nice walking distance to Bondi Beach. Especially recommend the Bondi Coastal Walk to Coogee. All in all, a first-class stay that I would highly recommend to others. Thank you for making this Airbnb experience so exceptional! We had a lovely stay at Ritchi’s apartment, it is in the perfect location and only 10 minutes from the beach. We had excellent communication and any questions were answered quickly. It was also incredibly clean and had everything we needed, including some lovely towels and chocolates on arrival. Soggiorno bellissimo nel cuore di BONDI beach, ci siamo sentiti come a casa! Vicinissimi ai negozi ristoranti e soprattutto all’ iconica spiaggia!
Ritchi e’ un’oste delizioso gentile e presente per qualsiasi cosa!
Grazie per l’ospitalità!!!
Josephine Tommaso e Debora
Torneremo sicuramente! A fantastic stay in a gorgeous apartment that was in the perfect location for our family. We were extremely grateful to Ritchi for catering for our baby and sourcing a portacot, high chair and baby bath. Thank you! What a spot!
Ritchi was an amazing host, so helpful and accommodating for our trip.
The apartment was perfect for a weekend away, with some lovely touches - would highly recommend and definitely be back! Great place to stay in Bondi Beach! Ritchi was a fantastic host. Great stay! Ritchie was super friendly and helpful with all the infos needed. His place is very homey, chic, and squeaky clean toilet, indeed. The welcome goodies were very heartwarming too. Would love to there stay again sometime in the near future. An amazing stay!! Being just a short 10 minute walk into the Main Street of Bondi, we couldn’t have asked for a better location to explore the place but also come back to a quiet, relaxing house. Ritchi made our trip to Sydney very easy and was an amazing host, offering us an early check in, providing us with welcome treats, fantastic recommendations for Bondi, giving us lovely, clean, cosy accomodation and granting us a late checkout! Would definitely recommend this stay and will be coming back on my next trip to Sydney. 10/10 :) Ritchi's place is AWESOME!! He was so helpful, the instructions for check in etc were clear and easy to follow. The apartment was light and bright, stocked with everything you could possibly need and was a great base. Thanks Ritchi!!! Ritchi is an amazing host and the Bondi Haven was so lovely. A perfectly decorated, spotlessly clean and functional space for our family of 4. Super easy check in and check out. Great communication with Ritchi, he was helpful and friendly. Beds were comfy, towels and linen fresh and kitchen and bathroom immaculate.
This is not reflection on the stay whatsoever but more an FYI….if you don’t need a hire car as you will stay local to Bondi (heaps of restaurants and shops within walking distance from here) then don’t bother as the parking situation is a bit of a nightmare in this area. I would definitely recommend a stay here to anyone - 5 stars! Ritchi was a fantastic host, always responded fast and went above and beyond to ensure we enjoyed our stay. The linen was fresh, house was spotless and it was a seamless check in and check out. Thanks Ritchi!! I had an amazing stay at this house near Bondi Beach! The location is fantastic, just a 10-minute walk to the beach. The house was spotlessly clean, comfortable, and well-maintained. Ritchi, the owner, was incredibly kind and helpful. He provided us with great suggestions for traveling around Sydney. I really enjoyed my time here and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to stay in Bondi Beach.
Love it!
Luna Excellent Airbnb, comfortable, spacious and clean. Ritchi was very responsive and friendly. Great location, easy walking distance to Bondi Beach 🏖️

Great location, very friendly host. Would stay again. I spent five nights at Dan’s place and thoroughly enjoyed my stay. The flat was clean, cosy, and had nice amenities. I was particularly crazy about the coffee machine and milk frother. The upstairs bedroom had air conditioning which was a nice amenity. Surry Hills is also a great area with so many shops, cafes and restaurants close by. The Museum of Australia was a 25 minute walk and Hyde Park even closer. I really liked the vibrancy of the neighbourhood. I was also very grateful to Dan for offering an early check in. It made my life so much easier! I would highly recommend this Airbnb! The welcome food was super good. I had great sleep in there and host was super kind and he respond quickly when I chat to him. Great stay, awesome host who was communicative and responsive; left clear instructions, house was immaculate and he even left us snacks for arrival.
Top tier stay. Great place. This lovely house was perfect for the four of us. It is well furnished and ideally located in a quiet area with a variety of cafes, restaurants and bars to choose from. Everything was immaculately clean and tidy. The location is great, 15 minutes from the CBD by bus or 25 minutes walk. Dan and Eduardo were very kind and responsive. All in all we had a great stay. 지금까지 가봤던 숙소중 가장훌륭합니다~
호스트도 정말친절하고~ 필요한모든것들이 준비되어있었습니다~ 가장기억에 남았던것은 웰컴푸드과, 일찍 체크인할수있어서 정말 기분좋은 시드니여행이었습니다~!! 다음에도 시드니 온다면 이곳에서 머무를것입니다^^ You can’t go wrong with Surry Hills and this house offers pretty much everything you need. Perfect for public transport. Reuben Hills or Single O for breakfast, Royal Albert Hotel or Keg & Brew rooftop bar for a cold beer and Bar Copains for a spectacular dinner… everything is only a few steps away. The accomodation is very quiet and feels roomy even for four people. One minor disadvantage is that only one bedroom has an air conditioning. It was pretty hot and we couldn’t really cool the back bedroom down. But apart from that we really enjoyed our stay. Loved Dan’s place! A great base to explore Sydney. Would stay again 하우스라 벌래가 있다는점. 이층으로 짐을 옮겨야된다는점이외에는 너무너무 만족스러웠음
벌레가 있을수있다구 스프레이를 다 준비해주셨구 체크인시간도 일찍가능하게 해주신점 그리고 윌컴 푸드가 너무 많아 깜짝놀랐습니다. This place became home away from home very quickly. Not only was it a lovely space but all of the appliances were top notch, with plenty of dinnerware to go with it. The host had the house ready for us when we arrived and provided us with some fruits and snacks that us to relax on arrival, instead of rushing out to get food. Thank you for being an outstanding host. Dan and Eduardo were wonderful hosts - they were easy to communicate with and were extremely understanding and accommodating. Their home was exactly as described and was well located, within close proximity to cafes, shops, and public transport. Made our stay very pleasant. Will definitely stay here again if I’m back in Sydney Gorgeous Federation town house, exactly as pictured. Great location, short 10min walk to central train station and light rail stop. Really nice restaurants nearby and the local pub close by has amazing food and great staff, and as close as it is there is no late night noise. The stairs up to the bedroom are a little steep and narrow but that’s what you expect for an old home. Hosts were amazing, quick to respond, really helpful. Highly recommend and would stay again. Great little townhouse in a beautiful location. Quiet and peaceful. Highly recommend! The location is superb. The fruit and other items was a nice touch. Dan was a very helpful host 머무르는 동안 정말 좋았습니다. 호스트의 세심한 배려와 깔끔함이 잘 느껴졌습니다. 침대는 푹신하고 화장실운 넓었으며 다이닝 공간과 거실도 만족스러웠습니다. 인테리어도 예뻤습니다

Great restaurants downstairs, close to public transport
Large for a 1 bedroom Fantastic host, went over and above in helping me. Extremely responsive. Great place that is really well furnished and maintained. Very clean also, so central to everything. Only small suggestion would be a heater for cold nights. Our stay at La's place was awesome! His appartment is very spaceious and stylish. It's located close to the Bondi Beach and Sydneys City Center. From this location your able to expolore each part of Sydney very comfortable. Strongly recommended! La's flat is best described as home away from home, the flat itself its well maintained and has all the amenities. Great view of the common roof top where you can see the downing harbor bridge from a far. Very close to the train and bus terminal (5 mins walk) which made my commute from one place to another very easy - both CBD and bondi beach are just a train and bus a way. It is very ideal for a short or long stay should you visit Sydney. His flat has an amazing well equipped balcony where i spent most of the time unwinding when i am around the flat. The only regret is that i don't get to use the bbq facility which i think would be cool.
Minor challenge for some perhaps (which in the first few days i find it very challenging) is that this flat is not equipped with AC.. so if you are a person who is used to have this fixture in your home this would be a deal breaker especially in the summer when you come home from all the day's walk.. but nonetheless La's flat has couple of fan to make sure your stay cool. Shame i don't get to meet him in person but by the sound of our communication by message and over the phone I'm sure his one heck of a nice fella. The location  is great, but overall, I would say I was disappointed with this accommodation. The biggest single problem was damp  Having a fan and a dehumidifier in a room to make it liveable is not a reasonable situation. Significant amounts of water were condensed by the dehumidifier and the only ventilation possible in the room was to leave the main door open and lock the inner grill door.  You cannot open any windows as they are completely sealed glass units. When we discussed the situation with Marika, she did not really seem to engage with the issue. The shower was very good although it needed a nonslip mat in the shower and somewhere to hang your towel properly. . The main room had a mishmash of rather dated furniture (like an old sideboard) and the curtains didn’t properly close. My wife would not use the wardrobe as it had a significant damp smell. Based on the previous reviews, I was really disappointed with what I saw and frankly surprised.

We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again if we visit Sydney in the future and would definitely recommend it as place to stay.

The promise of parking onsite had also been a selling point- and although I was warned it was first in first served, I was not told there are a total of 6 spots available for two entire unit buildings. I can't say enough about this place: the sunny terrace is perfect for passing the day away overlooking the gorgeous north shore, the kitchen is full-featured and the living room is bright and tranquil. The bedroom is whisper-quiet, and the back garden is a lovely spot to sit and have a cup of coffee while the birds sing.
It was important to me that the place had a washer and dryer. The washer is gigantic. I barely used the dryer because I preferred to dry my clothes on the clothesline in the backyard.
Added bonuses include the carport (though street parking is unmetered and always in supply) and the relaxing bathtub.
Walking around the area is a real pleasure, and there's a million restaurants, cafes, bars and shops just a stone's throw away. Personally I prefer having a car in Cremorne, but it's not a necessity.
Tim and Vicki were particularly hospitable. They always made themselves available, and they are just a couple of intelligent, engaging, kind people (with a great bookshelf!)

Great place, gracious host, convenient location! Second stay, feel like home as always! Very great place, easy from Roseville station and easy walk to chatswood center. Very clean and well organised. Grace is the most thoughtful, gracious host. She is quick at responding and always willing to help. Didn’t find a proper long term accommodation upset me, but staying with Grace made me feel just like home.
It was an amazing and unexpected journey that I will never forget. We had a great week at Grace‘s place. It was very private and extremely clean and we felt very safe. We could walk to both Roseville and Chatswood stations so it was very easy to get into the city. There are some great cafes at Roseville station so we could start every day with an excellent coffee. Grace was quick to respond and extremely kind. A well maintained cozy self contained place, easy walking distance to the train station. Roseville and Chatswood trains run very frequently. Chatswood is good for grocery shopping. Easy parking. The stand-alone house is at the back of the property is new and very clean. (Being a no shoes home helps). It is well equipped with dish and clothes washing machines and even a second microwave oven.
The house is not cluttered with supplies and as we were here for several days we visited the local supermarket for toilet paper, rubbish bags, soap, dish powder and laundry liquid. You might want to bring some cutlery as only a set of three is provided.
The air conditioner is excellent. The shower is fantastic. Optus Internet works reliably and gets 50/20Mbps. A second key was not available which was a pity. Two towels are provided but a hand towel would be nice. Parking out front fairly close by is no problem.
Grace was very welcoming and the location is convenient. Chickens can be heard near by which is very sweet. Overall, good value.

Had a great stay. Perfectly set up for a family with young kids. Plenty of books and toys as well as the pool and spa kept us all entertained for the week, despite some poor weather. Airbnb at its best, with a family opening up their home for others to respectfully use. Lovely place and local beaches were excellent, rock pools were great with kids
Loved the pool and spa. Great holiday home for our family with four young kids. Shops and beach all easy to walk to. Really enjoyable experience A slice of the great Australian dream! We live in an apartment in the desert, so having a big backyard for the kids to play and an open kitchen and lounge with a gas fireplace was heaven for us. It's so close to the shops and our family and friends, so we had an amazing week there.
The bedrooms were spacious and cosy. Big bathtubs and great amenities.
We hope to be able to come back in summer to use the pool, outdoor shower and walk to the beach.
We're so grateful to the hosts for sharing their beautiful home.

A few things that I wish we knew about before booking:
- The owners stayed in a cottage directly attached to the house and so we didn't quite have the entire home to ourselves as advertised.
- The neighbours are also very close and lack of/low fences meant they could see directly into the downstairs lounge while they were out in their garden. If we had used the hot tub, it would also have been in full view of the neighbour's house.
- The spa's heating function wasn't working during our stay. This wasn't the owners' fault but was a little disappointing as we had chosen the place mainly for the hot tub.
- The path from the house to the street-level driveway is at quite a steep incline and a fair distance but I do believe you can contact the owners to use the inclinator if you have a lot of luggage.
Overall these things didn't take away too much from our stay. We had a great time and would definitely recommend the place to others (with the above caveats). We stayed at Kerry's cosy little place for a week with our baby. It was a nice stay with a very modern bathroom, comfortable bed and good eateries within pram distance. Our baby loved the large windows looking out onto the street, and slept well in the porta-cot Kerry made available. The washer drier makes use of a heat pump so it worked well for our needs. A full sized dishwasher was also very useful. There's no fan/exhaust over the portable stove/grill and there's only a bar fridge, but there's so many well rated restaurants nearby it was an easy choice to eat out.
The space has a lot of appliances you can use, so we had some initial hiccups with the fuse, but Kerry was very helpful and the fuse box was easily accessible too. We did stay during the middle of winter and had both heaters going at times so it was just a case of figuring out how to better distribute the load across the many power points. I booked this for my elderly parents for a few nights while they were moving into retirement living. The heaters provided did not adequately heat the space. Additionally a fuse kept tripping and my parents were unable to reset it. We informed the host who told us not to move the heaters (the heaters were in the same place as when my parents checked in), but did not offer any other solution. Ultimately, my parents could only stay one night of a 4 night stay and I had to sort out alternative accommodation for them.
Additionally, the Netflix account had been logged in to the hosts account and was protected with a PIN. I messaged the host about this and the host emailed back a link to the Netflix website and said to follow the link to sort out logging in. I found the response from the host pretty disappointing and would have expected her to sort out the issue with the fuse and TV in person. We highly recommend Kerry's lovely listing. We were lucky enough to stay for a month in this beautifully designed space. We especially recommend it for dog owners ... your dog will greatly appreciate their own enclosed backyard to explore, and long glorious walks around Haberfield where our dog Kit made many friends.

The accommodation is clean but basic, with steep, narrow stairs typical of old Sydney sandstone terraces. It's ideal for solo travelers or small groups needing a central place to sleep.

Très bien situé, dans une rue calme, à 15 minutes à pied (belle balade dans la végétation luxuriante) de la plage de Balmoral, magnifique. Excellent café Source à 2 pas. On y a passé un très bon séjour! We loved our stay at the Muston apartment. The place is very spacious and has a beautiful character. This place was really nice overall and our hosts downstairs were very welcoming. Felt quaint and well-loved, with lots of books and old records around, even some antique rocking horses for our toddler. The view from the balcony is wonderful! The apartment was well-stocked and very walkable, just a few minutes from Balmoral Beach and the shops and restaurants in Mosman. Unfortunately, it could also use some upgrades and maintenance. It was extremely dusty and, having bad allergies, I had to deep clean the rooms myself since we were staying for three weeks. There were dead roaches on the floor when we arrived even though the cleaner was just there (the service kindly allowed us to drop our stuff early). The apartment is on the top floor. So if you're travelling with a toddler or baby, the steep stairs are definitely a concern. We barricaded the top of the stairs with a heavy chair in the absence of a baby gate. Other than that, it suited our needs and we felt right at home. To be honest, the cleaning fee is so high but it’s not worth the stay. The place is still so dusty and we find stains on one of the pillows. Table cloth as well. One of the cupboard doors is broken. Quite a bit of fixing needs to be done. Fan and above the fridge are full of dust. Insufficient toilet paper, only 1 roll given for our whole 4 days stay isn’t enough. Only 1 lights works in the master bedroom. Sofa is ready to get thrown out as you literally sink into the couch. Heater and hot water are fine in this cold winter. Please reconsider charging such a high cleaning fee or change your cleaner cause it’s not done properly. There are stairs and quite tight. Not elderly friendly. 房间干净整洁，适合家庭带孩子度假，厨房用具齐全，牙刷牙膏洗发水需要自带，房间有提供沐浴露和洗手液。出门可步行至海边。公交车站也可步行到达。附近有超市、餐厅和药房。街道安静优美。适合度假旅游观光。 A super place to stay.

Sehr gute Unterkunft mit allen was man braucht. Lage ist super, nahe dem Hafen, Strand und direkt an der Fußgängerzone.

Great location, beautiful views, clean, great level of communication. Interior designed "penthouse" isn't exactly the words I would use to describe apartment. I doubt that this apartment would be on our "go to" listing in the future as there are many more on offer within Airbnb at a competitive price that offer both cleanliness, bespoke design, layout, location and amenities that far outweigh what the dollar value you receive than this one . There are some photos on views from the apartment - the 'view from the bedroom' picture is quite different (further and maybe 30-45 degrees offset from what can actually be seen from the room - you will need to stick your head out pretty unsafely to see the same view), so if you are looking for bridge/fireworks views look somewhere else...you can't see it as much as the photo. the view can only be seen from the neighbours in the same building. however, I do believe most will stay for location, which is exceptional. We (family of 5) had a very good stay. Best parts:
- Superb views, in nearly all directions, from nearly every room
- Surprisingly spacious, considering the location. 5 of us did not feel cramped.
- Enormous balcony area, a substantial outside open space with amazing views
- Great location for restaurants and transport
The views & spaciousness are better than come across in the AirBnb listing, a pleasant surprise.
Niggles:
- The property is 'functional' rather than 'homely'.
- It can be a surprising mix of high-quality (e.g. crockery, cutlery) and oddly cheap (e.g; blankets, coat hangers).
- The amazing balcony area is spartan, bit of a missed opportunity.

짧은 시간을 보내기에 적합합니다. 벌레를 싫어한다면 호텔을 가세요. 주방은 있지만 깨끗하지 않습니다. 전반적인 보수가 필요합니다. Basic but perfectly fine for my overnight trip. Close to public transport. Aircon worked well on a hot day. Hilton was very accommodating and flexible, nothing to say about that. However, the apartment left much to be desired. Although it matched the photos, there were a few details that were obviously not specified: the non-existent shower pressure (when you're a woman, it's very difficult to wash your hair), the constant leakage of water into the bathroom sink (we don't know whether it's coming from the toilet or not, yuck), the horrible smell of the air-conditioning (which we didn't use very much), the smell of the sheets and towels (whichc sorry but smelled of used linen), and last but not least, our friends the cockroaches (although there are a lot of them in Australia)! It's also worth noting that there are no doors between the kitchen/bedroom and the bathroom/toilet, which is great fun when there are two of you and the other needs to go to the toilet, if you know what I mean 😬
Apart from that the apartment has good value for money. Great value, locations superb and very comfy stay. Despite no off street parking, we didn't have any issues getting an unlimited car park - usually right out the front of the property. Property was very clean, has recently renovated bathrooms and two outdoor areas with amazing views of the harbour. Our only feedback would be there could be a few more drinking glasses available.

Overall the place was good and clean. We only stayed a night for work in the area. Great place to stay to visit the city of Sydney. Manly beaches were very close and easy to travel to the city with the Ferry which is a must if you are new to Sydney. You have Coles, Aldi, Woolworths (and Dan Murphy's) within 2min with a car and a couple restaurants and coffee within walking distance. Bus stop is almost at the building so that was perfect. The place was impecable, the only downside we found was the car street noise at times which wasn't a big deal if we are out to experience the city and at best you can close the windows, put the aircon on and forget about it. Fans provided for every room to keep the air flowing. Great for the price as Manly in general can be a bit pricey. We enjoyed the time there. Great location. Liedessä vain yhdessä polttimossa kaasu pysyi auki. Pyyhkeet olivat ohuet ja niistä irtosi nukkaa iholle. Sängyt toisessa makuuhuoneessa oli tosi kovat. Automme ei mahtunut korkeuden takia parkkihalliin, mutta kadun varrella oli ilmaista pysäköidä. Manly beach ja kaupat olivat kävelymatkan päässä. Pidin itse hintaa korkeana, mutta alueen hintatasoon verrattuna hinta oli edullisimpia katselemistamme kohteista. Kimi’s apartment exceeded our expectations, was spacious, light filled and clean with a bathrooms attached to each bedroom, plenty of space to move around and spotless kitchen and living room.
We were extremely happy with our choice of apartment.

Overall experience was very pleasant.
I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend Kimi’s place to stay in Clean, private and accommodating. Highly recommend 🙂

Location was good, facility had good appliances.
There is no heating or cooling devices, so summer will be uncomfortable. I stayed in my room for 30 mins max after spotting BED BUGS all over the room. On the couch, the bed, basically everywhere! Located in a lovely residential area and convenient for both our Ashfield relatives and for getting into town.

Well equipped with AC throughout and a great kitchen with new appliances.
Comfortable beds.
Would strongly recommend. Fantastic spot in a superb location. The description “ charming cottage” is 100% accurate. We will definitely look to stay again on our next trip to Sydney. Perfect place for me and my family from overseas to enjoy a weekend in Sydney. Easy enough to get the ferry into the city. Heaps of restaurants, cafes and pubs at walking distance. Such a beautiful and spacious house. Would highly recommend. Beautiful home well presented easy access.
Highly recommend staying A beautiful period home reflective of Rozelle’s unique character and charm. Perfectly located to shops, the harbour, lovely walks and the CBD. I cannot say enough good things about Annie’s cottage.
I’m not sure the photos quite do it justice. The cottage is beautifully renovated and thoughtfully comfortable, with lovely bedrooms and tons of pillows and towels. The kitchen is very well-appointed; we are at least two meals a day at home and never found that we were missing a key kitchen tool or dish. It was quite hot outside, but the a/c was more than adequate for our over-air-conditioned American tastes.
The location is perfect. On the main drag just between Rozelle and Balmain, with plenty of restaurants and grocers within walking distance or a 5 minute Uber. It’s also a short walk to the Bay Run if you’d like to exercise or sit by the water.
Finally, Annie was a stellar host. I had a couple of questions about the house leading up to check in and she responded within minutes. Such a great cottage in the heart of Rozelle.
Comfy beds, lovely linen and everything in walking distance.
Parking can be a little tricky so we parked and left the car and took advantage of walking and Ubers.
Cannot wait to come back again. Felt like home and was comfortable. We will happily stay there again
Annie was a great host friendly and easy to communicate with.
Thanks Annie for letting us use your home Well located, spacious cottage in the heart of Rozelle. This property exceeded all our expectations. It was immaculately presented, very comfortable and a real home away from home.
Annie’s communication was above and beyond.
Thank you Great spot to base yourself in Sydney. Right next to the Rozelle and Balmain shops, plenty of cafes and pubs nearby and an easy walk to the ferry. Annie was super helpful and flexible with checking in and checkout timing. Highly recommend! Great base to explore Sydney from we had a wonderful stay 5 of us spent 2 nights at Darling Cottage and had an absolutely wonderful time. Annie was a fantastic host. She was easy to get hold of, friendly and responsive. Annie gave us lots of recommendations for local restaurants and cafes.
The cottage is beautiful! It is well equiped with everything you need and the decor is gorgeous.
All of the people in our group said how comfortable the beds were.
It is really close to the main street in Rozelle where all the shops, bars and restaurants are located. (Literally a 1 minute walk).
We even walked to Birkenhead Point outlet mall which is only an easy 30 minute walk from home.
I'd highly recommend Darling Cottage to anyone looking to stay in this part of Sydney. You won't be disappointed! A very charming and cozy place. Easily the best airbnb to date I’ve been to. The 7 of us had a comfortable stay from start to end. Everything was really clean, toilets had everything. Thought went into setting up this place from the extension cords each side of the bed, extra floor mats and really lush amenities. Not to mention the beautiful fireplace. It really felt like a home put together with love. The water heater for the shower worked amazing, all of us had enough for a long hot shower. Location wise, it’s a 2 min walk to the bus stop and takes under 20 mins down to CBD. I would definitely want to come back here next time I’m in Sydney. Thank you Annie for a wonderful stay Great location, lovely spot for a cosy winter stay. Well stocked kitchen and Annie was an accomodating and flexible host. Great location and nice unit, comes with park which is hard to find in Glebe Glebe is a wonderful neighborhood and this was a wonderful apartment in Glebe. Great public transport - your pick of bus, light rail or ferry, or you can walk to Broadway in about 25 mins. Close to Tramsheds, lots of shops, cafes, restaurants. Oh, and great value for money. No lift and hard for elderly to walk up and down. Should be described in property description. needs a fan in the rooms.
needs a washing machine that doesnt jump off the floor.
The beds are as hot as a rock. I would suggest a very thick mattress topper.
overall it's a very nice property. Wonderful location, very easy to communicate with. Would definitely recommend. Great stay 这家民宿很棒，离机场才2-3公里，地铁或打车都方便，去市中心也有很多线路可以乘坐，在地铁站附近也有不少餐厅可供选择，附近的超市有woolworths、AD I、还有中式超市……坐公交4站左右还有IKEA和迪卡侬，总体来说所以无论长租短租的客人都不用担心采购的难度；
房间有两间都挺干净的，也有补充的浴巾毛巾、厕所内洗发水和沐浴露等都有（当然，牙刷牙膏需要自备）、洗衣机烘干机都一应俱全，阳台区有晾衣架方便一家子洗晒；厨房里配备的锅碗瓢盆也很齐全，做一桌子菜都妥妥的够用，调料区也是很齐全，我们根本不用自行采购什么调料，我们连续5-6天都自己采购烹饪都很方便；
去市中心的话一般都是半小时-1小时左右，地铁和公交都有，这对于不会开车又想节省打车费的人真的很赞；
民宿还有免费的地下停车位，对于租车的人来说很方便；
总之，这里提供了很多你想象不到的便捷服务，推荐大家来悉尼旅行可以选择哦！ Location was great. Easy access. Very clean, thank you. Amazing Airbnb 🤩 It’s a great apartment. Spotlessly clean and new. White towels and white linen. Recommend! Great location near restaurants. An amazing place to stay. Will be bringing more family and friends back to this place. Beautiful spot and cute little place. Apartment is an older building and parking provided was too narrow for our car (Mitsubishi Outlander) and we had to park on street. Our second car (Kia Cerato), was also a tight fit but successfully managed to park this car but a very tight squeeze.

We recommend the apartment and would stay again for the location. Great location. Beach, groceries and cafes very close and easy to get to. Place was neat and tidy. A great place to stay. Upon arrival, there was a large amount of rubbish outside the house which was promptly removed once we informed the host. Friendly staff quiet room. The room was spacious and in a vibrant, bustling neighbourhood close to great options for food and drink. The building also had a nice communal rooftop area.
However, there's no getting around the age and state of disrepair of the unit and the building overall. Many of the fixtures and fittings were chipped, cracked or degraded, and the building was overall quite noisy. The unit was also quite dark, with no bedside/reading lights.
If you're a heavy sleeper looking for a convenient place to enjoy a lively area, this place is fine. But if you're looking for peace and comfort, there are likely better options.

Our original booked place, we were told two days before we depart that the place was not available due to toilet was flooded and need repair. we were offered to change to another place and lucky, it is nearby as our original booked place is very close to rail/subway station. However, the way to find the key to go into the apartment was a bit difficult and surprised to us as a first time to visit Sydney. The key was located outside the building and used a lock pad to keep the key at a public place. We finally found the key after contact Rob's local staff but it was almost an hour later. One more issue was, they sent cleaner to clean the house in the middle of our stay but we were not notified. So, it was another surprised when we back to the apartment at night and found someone had came. Their local staff confirmed it was their cleaner. Thank you for hosting us and being very responsive. Rob and Marie went above and beyond to make our stay the best possible. They replaced the washing machine as soon as we alerted of hygiene problem. I would recommend!

첫 날 입실 시에는 자물쇠가 오래되어 제대로 열리지 않고 호스트와 연락이 원활히 이루어지지 않아 입실에 큰 어려움을 겪었습니다.
저희는 만 하루도 채 지나지 않은 시점에 많은 바퀴벌레와 파리를 마주했습니다. 바퀴벌레의 경우, 숙소 문을 열자마자 한 마리, 냉장고 문을 열자마자 한 마리, 화장실 문을 열자마자 한 마리 마주쳤고 지금도 저희 눈 앞에 있습니다. 파리의 경우, 체크인하자마자 최소 다섯 마리의 파리가 눈 앞에 날아다니고 있었습니다.
체크인 12시간 후인 시점까지 우리는 10마리 이상의 바퀴벌레를 잡거나 목격했고, 10마리 이상의 파리를 창문 밖으로 내쫓았습니다.
특히 냉장고 문을 열자마자 바퀴벌레를 목격해서 냉장고 안을 살펴보니, 유통기한이 언제인지도 모를 음식들로 가득했습니다. 이는 해당 숙소가 매우 심각한 위생 상태를 보인다는 사실을 증명합니다.
또한 건조기와 세탁기에는 먼지가 가득해서 세탁기만 잠시 돌렸을 뿐인데(당연히 세탁기는 투숙객이 사용 가능한 시설로 표시되어 있었다) 세탁물에 먼지가 가득 묻어나왔습니다.
추가적으로 와이파이 정보를 문의하니 와이파이 이름은 dumplingswhofuck, 비밀번호에는 fat이라는 단어가 포함되어 인종차별 및 비하 발언이라고 생각하지 않을 수 없는 내용이 포함되어 있었습니다. 저희가 동양인임을 미리 밝혔기 때문에 이를 불쾌하게 받아들일 수밖에 없습니다.
마지막으로, 호스트에게 벌레 처리에 대해 문의하니 “시드니는 원래 바퀴벌레가 많다”는 궤변을 들었고, 벌레 기피제가 주방 캐비넷에 있다고 하여 열어보니 각종 음식물(젤리, 초콜렛 등)이 개봉된 상태로 있었습니다. 냉장고 내부 상황도 마찬가지였습니다. 누가 언제 먹다 남겼을지 모르는 음식물이 가득했습니다. 숙소의 청결에 큰 문제가 있음을 확인할 수 있는 상황입니다.
이러한 사유로 첫 날부터 제대로 휴식을 취하지 못하였습니다. 수면부족으로 눈은 심하게 떨리고 있으며, 계획된 일정을 제대로 소화하지 못하여 여행에 큰 차질을 겪었습니다. 최악의 숙소. Had such a nice 2 night stay at this apartment in Potts point. The apartment was smaller than I‘d expected. Fine for one person, but I can imagine that the ca. 1.20m bed and limited space could get crowded with two. Further, the windows open only a few centimeters and don’t let in enough fresh air during the night to cool down the apartment. I was aware that there is no air conditioning but the available fan cannot compensate a day full of sun. This was a perfect position in Potts Point/Elizabeth Bay.
A comfortable little bed-sit . I had a lovely stay, the area was very peaceful and had cafes etc nearby. Also a lovely park and tennis courts around the corner! Very nice Airbnb. Very well located. Прекрасная удобная кухня, оборудованная всем необходимым, было очень удобно готовить.

Great stay Tammy’s place in Darlinghurst is the perfect place to stay with friends to explore downtown Sydney. The beds were so comfy and the place has everything you need including air conditioning (so needed for the summers in Sydney), kitchenette, and a combo washer/dryer.
You have easy access to Sydney’s nightlife on Oxford street which is just up the road from the Airbnb. The main shopping areas on George and Pitt street are just 15 min away by transit. There are also coffee shops where you can grab a bite for breakfast or lunch just a step away.
One thing to note is that the two bedrooms and bathrooms are on the second and third floor so if you or your guests have mobility issues that could be a problem.
Tammy was really responsive to any questions I had. Overall, I highly recommend staying at this Airbnb. Outstanding Airbnb!

Thank you ladies.. if I could give you a 10 out of 5 I definitely would!! One of my favourite areas in inner Sydney. Central to everything. Close to public transport for longer trips but walkable to everything in the inner east of Sydney. Modern version of a skinny townhouse you might find in Amsterdam. Polished concrete on bottom floor (entry) perfect for our dog to hang out and lot's of little parks, green spaces and laneways in the vicinity for her to explore and meet other dogs. And only a slightly longer walk to some larger parks/recreational areas. Surrounded by great museums, galleries, restaurants, pubs and nightlife for the humans. A remarkably quiet and private apartment given its location with usual city sounds. The apartment is compact but really well planned, with a gorgeous timber staircase (3 levels), natural light via skylights and a fantastic balcony off the main bedroom on the 3rd floor (top level) that is surprisingly private and sheltered by a beautiful tree. Highly recommended for a stay just outside of the Sydney CBD in the inner East. The apartment itself is lovely - beach vibes in the middle of the city. Very comfortable beds, including (incredibly), the sofa bed. The downstairs kitchen/dining/lounge is rather small, but functional. The 2 bedrooms on the upper two levels are beautiful. Shower pressure isn't the best but certainly passable. The location is great, in the centre of Darlinghurst but not too loud(I wore the very considerately host supplied ear plugs). Only a couple hundred metres to a well stocked Woolworths Metro supermarket, parking, central park(not all in the same direction). Tammy was a fantastic communicator. Great place to stay & great location for getting in or out of the city. BEAUTIFUL PLACE
BEAUTIFUL HOST.

John & Maureen from the UK. We stay here with my family for 5 days, it was spacious, good locations and Gina was amazing. She guide us all the way from check in to check out. It's suits all our needs.

Vivian’s place was great. She was a great host and kept us up to date with how to enter the building etc. Would recommend anyone to stay here. Great location to the hospital where i was working. About a 800m walk to Westfield and 1km to the train station. It was quiet and well equipped. Thanks Vivian. Easy and detailed check in, mostly clean, a couple damages that were already there (would advise anyone to take photos on arrival and at checkout). Fantastic hosts who went out of their way to accommodate our family. Highly recommend. Everything was just perfect for our young family Nice & clean, had a great time.
100% recommend. A modern, clean, and comfortable property! Vivian is the best host!! This was our first stop on our family trip to Australia, and we’re so glad we stayed here. The location is super convenient for getting around! It’s very convenient for those driving here, with free parking available. The Wi-Fi is fast, and Vivian responds quickly to any questions. We had an amazing stay at this property! The house was spotless, well-maintained, and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect, close to key attractions, and the communication with the host was seamless. The host was friendly and responsive, making sure we had everything we needed. We really enjoyed the cozy atmosphere and all the little touches that made the place feel like home. Highly recommend this place to anyone visiting the area!
Booking was cancelled on us after the Check-In details where sent leaving us stranded without a place to stay
The property was amazing! Beautiful, roomy, clean & lovely views.  Couldn’t ask for me!

Nice clean place.
Close to where we needed to be.
Quiet unit.
Key collection and return easy.
Happy to stay again. This place was good for what we needed it for, it was clean, good location, close to an IGA and many food places. Couch was uncomfortable to say the least. Over good place.

The place was good overall. I had an issue with the bed, but it was fixed the next day. Petite maison avec beaucoup de personnes présentes je dirais au moins 8 chambres au total.
La salle de bain était vraiment très sale, les toilettes aussi ainsi que la chambre. Pleins de poussière sous le lit, les lattes du lit qui sont cassés, la poignée de porte cassée.
Assez fidèle aux photos mais la propreté était vraiment pas au rdv. Nous avons pris cette option car le logement pour un logement près d’un arrêt de train et pas très loin de CBD Sydney ( 40 m en train ) est pratique et pas très cher. Pour des personnes de passage pour 2 jours et des backs packers c’est ok mais je n’aurais pas conseillé ce logement pour mes parents par exemple. Les portes sont équipées de code chaque personne qui rentre claque la porte et on entend tout dans les autres chambres.
Cependant parking gratuit à côté ce qui est pratique petit jardin, machine à laver aussi ce qui est bien
Logement ok mais dommage que le ménage n’est pas pris au sérieux malgré les frais de ménage appliqués.

Had a great stay! The place was clean, well-equipped, and the host was responsive and helpful. The only minor issue was a lingering smell left by the previous guest, which wasn't the host's fault, but it took some time to air out. Otherwise, everything was perfect. Would recommend! ⭐⭐⭐⭐✨
Thanks for a great stay. Place was perfect for what we needed.
Would stay again, the views were beautiful and lovely places to walk to. Really enjoyed my stay here
A very convenient location for me and easy to find. A responsive host who was easy to communicate with during my stay.

Briohny is the kindest soul, she‘s been super accommodating and the place was exactly as described! The room was very clean and we enjoyed our time with her and her sweet dog Holiday!
Living with her is really chill, so we would definitely stay here again🙏🏼 Briohny’s place is great - loved the backyard but mostly she is a wonderful host and person to talk to! Felt easy to come and go, and nice to be in a true home. Briohny has a bubbly personality and was a fantastic host who made me feel very welcome. The amenities were exactly as described in the listing with secure parking being provided on request. Briohny went way beyond her brief and drove me to my restaurant when a surge in demand caused the Uber price to jump 3 x in just 10 minutes.

Great place! We were able to walk Sydney From here. Such a great neighborhood with shops and things to do steps from the front door.
Can't wait to come back to 'straya and stay here. Good communication from host
Great location and comfortable apartment with good security made for an enjoyable stay Great place with all the accessories available in the kitchen for a comfortable “cook at home” stay Thank you to Maisonnets, this beautiful little apartment was perfect for me. It is a brand-new listing and they have got absolutely everything right. The styling is just beautiful and it’s not like your usual Airbnb that sometimes can lack personality. You can see whoever has styled this apartment is very passionate about what they do. Having a king size bed is a plus and it was so comfortable. The apartment has absolutely everything you need, including a gymnasium which I didn’t get to use this time but I will be back! All within a short stroll into the CBD you just can’t go past this
Thank you for having me. I was privileged to be the first guest. 🙏
Good clean room easy to find

I stayed at other accommodations but ended up coming back to Mamta’s place—this just shows how great it is! It truly feels like home. Amazing Stay – Highly Recommended!
Review: I had a fantastic stay at Mamta’s place! The home was spotless, beautifully decorated, and had all the amenities I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfect—close to Canada bay. Mamta was incredibly friendly and responsive, providing great local tips and ensuring everything was just right. I truly felt at home and would love to stay again in the future. Highly recommend to anyone visiting the area!
Thank you Junior for an incredible stay. Your place is perfect and just what we needed for our weekend get away by the Sea! We'll be back for sure!

Our stay was excellent, the property was conveniently located for our weekend activities at Olympic Park, was luxurious and clean and Sylvia was an excellent host and very responsive. We will definitely stay again! It’s an amazing place, very aesthetic and beautiful view
The house was clean and matched the photos, Sylvia is very friendly and the communication was easy and fast.
We loved the place and wished we stayed longer.
Thank you Sylvia for hosting us 🙂

great accommodation in an awesome location walking distance to everything awesome in Coogee. Hosts were super accommodating and helpful would highly recommend
I had a very short overnight stay for work. The room had everything I needed and check in although 9pm was easy and friendly.
Good location for a weekend getaway.  Brogan & William were really accessible and helpful.
It’s a great place to relax. Very quiet neighbourhood
The house is in a great location, very close to the supermarket, which is really convenient. The rooms are clean and well-maintained. We truly enjoyed our time here!
